languages.text: {n}Маражай прищелкивает языком и нежно проводит когтями перчатки по предмету в руке — тот откликается тихим писком.{/n} "Кажется, ты вош{mf|ел|ла} во вкус боли, мон-кай. Что ж, будь по-твоему: сопротивляйся неизбежному, и познаешь новую грань страданий".

{n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прищелкивает языком и нежно проводит когтями перчатки по предмету в руке — тот откликается тихим писком.{/n} "Кажется, ты вош{mf|ел|ла} во вкус боли, мон-кай. Что ж, будь по-твоему: сопротивляйся неизбежному, и познаешь новую грань страданий".

Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue et caresse doucement l'objet dans ses mains avec les griffes de son gant, lui faisant produire un petit crissement.{/n} « Il semble que vous ayez pris goût à la douleur, mon-keigh. Soit, comme il vous plaira. Résistez à la fatalité et découvrez un nouveau pan de souffrance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue et caresse doucement l'objet dans ses mains avec les griffes de son gant, lui faisant produire un petit crissement.{/n} « Il semble que vous ayez pris goût à la douleur, mon-keigh. Soit, comme il vous plaira. Résistez à la fatalité et découvrez un nouveau pan de souffrance. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌，带着利爪的手套轻轻地抚摸着手中的物体，它发出了轻微的尖叫声。{/n}“看来你已经品尝到了痛苦的滋味，猴子。既然如此，就按你说的办吧，试着去抵抗无法避免的事情，品尝前所未有的痛苦吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌，带着利爪的手套轻轻地抚摸着手中的物体，它发出了轻微的尖叫声。{/n}“看来你已经品尝到了痛苦的滋味，猴子。既然如此，就按你说的办吧，试着去抵抗无法避免的事情，品尝前所未有的痛苦吧。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちをすると、手袋の爪で手の中の物を優しく撫で、小さな鳴き声を出させた。{/n}「痛みの味を覚えたようだな、モン＝ケイ。ならば好きにしろ。避けられぬことに抗って、苦しみの新たな一面を知るがいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちをすると、手袋の爪で手の中の物を優しく撫で、小さな鳴き声を出させた。{/n}「痛みの味を覚えたようだな、モン＝ケイ。ならば好きにしろ。避けられぬことに抗って、苦しみの新たな一面を知るがいい」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge und streichelt zärtlich mit den Krallen seines Handschuhs über den Gegenstand in seinen Händen, der daraufhin ein wenig quietscht.{/n} "Es wirkt ganz so, als wärt Ihr auf den Geschmack von Schmerz gekommen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wie Ihr wollt. Widersetzt Euch dem Unvermeidlichen und lernt eine neue Facette des Leids kennen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge und streichelt zärtlich mit den Krallen seines Handschuhs über den Gegenstand in seinen Händen, der daraufhin ein wenig quietscht.{/n} "Es wirkt ganz so, als wärt Ihr auf den Geschmack von Schmerz gekommen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wie Ihr wollt. Widersetzt Euch dem Unvermeidlichen und lernt eine neue Facette des Leids kennen."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua y acaricia suavemente con las garras de su guantelete el objeto que sostiene en las manos, haciendo que emita un débil chillido.{/n} «Parece que le has cogido el gusto al dolor, mon-keigh. Como quieras: resiste lo inevitable y descubre una nueva faceta del sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

Como quieras: resiste lo inevitable y descubre una nueva faceta del sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dilini şaklatıp eldiveninin pençeleriyle elindeki nesneyi hafifçe okşuyor. Nesneden hafif bir ciyaklama sesi çıkıyor.{/n} "Acıdan tat almaya başlamışsın mon-keigh. Nasıl istersen öyle olsun. Kaçınılmaz olana direndikçe acının yeni suretleriyle karşılaşacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and gently caresses the object in his hands with the claws of his glove, making it emit a little squeal.{/n} "It looks like you have acquired a taste for pain, mon-keigh. Have it your way, then: resist the inevitable and know a new facet of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dilini şaklatıyor ve eldiveninin pençeleriyle elindeki nesneyi hafifçe okşuyor. Nesneden hafif bir ciyaklama sesi çıkıyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre acıdan tat almaya başlamışsın mon-keigh. Nasıl istersen öyle olsun. Kaçınılmaz olana direndikçe acının yeni suretleriyle karşılaşacaksın."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
